body.name: Travel Power Strip with USB C Port, NTONPOWER Flat Plug Extension Cord with 4 Outlets 3 USB (1 USB C) for Cruise Ship Essentials, 4ft Wrapped Short Extension Cord for Hotel Dorm Room
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 12 hrs 9 mins
features: 【Easy to Pack & 4FT Retractable Extension Cord】： Small size (3.98 x 2.36 x 1.57 in) with flexible 4ft Retractable Extension Cord cleverly wraps around the body and plugs into a ac socket for neat storage, which designed to be easily packed into any package, including handbags, backpacks and suitcases, without the hassle of managing the wires.

【Travel & Cruise Accessories Must Haves】: Designed with no surge protection, making it a cruise-approved power strip. At only 8 oz, about the weight of a small orange, and smaller than the iPhone 13 Mini, and 4ft short extension cord makes it easy to store and carry. NTONPOWER USB C travel power strip can fit comfortably in your palm or pocket—ideal to bring during business travel and vacations to keep all your travel essential devices charged.

【7 in 1 Travel Power Strip with USB C Ports】: 4 wide outlets (2 Type B 3 Prong outlets, 2 Type A 2 Prong outlets), and 3 USB ports(1 USB-C Ports) can power up to 7 travel device simultaneously on your desk from a single portable power strip. Extra space between each AC outlet on the compact power strip for larger plugs, outlets are distributed on different sides without blocking. The USB-C port and USB-A port are compatible with all USB charging devices, such as smartphones, e-readers, etc.

【Flat Plug Extension Cord for Saving Space Behind Furniture】: The added convenience of the handy space saver 45° right angle flat plug allows your furniture to sit flush to the wall - creating more space without bent wires.The ultra thin flat plug with 45-degree right-angled will not block the bottom receptacle of your duplex wall outlet.

【USB A & USB C Fast Charge】：3 USB Charging Station(USB-C port) provides 15w fast charging. With smart charging technology, the Type-C and 2 USB-A ports will identify your devices automatically and deliver the fastest and most suitable charging speed. Compatible with all USB charging devices, such as smartphones, e-readers, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 7-In-1 Portable Power Strip 4 outlets, 2 USB-A, and 1 USB-C port can charge 7 devices simultaneously.4ft extension cord wraps around itself to make it easy to pack.with only a 0.39-inch ultra-thin plug design, allows you to plug in anywhere.Without surge protection, to be fully cruise compliant.Recommendations from lnfluencers with Over 10+ Million Followers

4ft Retractable Extension Cord 4ft flat plug extension cord with rubber organizer band wraps cleverly wraps around the body and plugs into a ac socket for neat storage. Travel power strip can fit easily into any package, ideal to bring during business travel and vacations to keep all your travel essential devices charged.

No Matter Where Life Takes You Space Saving and Travel Ready Space Saving and Travel Ready Size: 3.9*2.3*1.5 Inch. Smaller than the size of an an cellphone and can fit easily into any package—ideal to bring while traveling.

Previous page Cruise Approved Power Strip Specially designed for cruise ship and travel. A perfect travel must-have. A lifesaver in travel Use it at the airport where there are so few plugs. Charge all your devices by just using one plug. A little on-the-go power distribution solution. When hotel rooms don't provide enough electrical outlets, it is great for charging in a hotel. Multi-functional products Not only can be used indoors, but also can be used for traveling. Next page 1 Travel Must Have 2 In Cruise Cabin 3 At the Airport 4 In the Hotel Room 5 At Home Office

Widely Spaced Power Strip 3.15in widely spaced outlets fit for a slightly big power adapters without blocking adjacent outlets. Saving your space and making your desktop organized. USB A & USB C Fast Charging Station Added more USB-C ports to meet more charging demand. 3 USB power strip provides 15w fast charging. Compatible with all USB charging devices.

Coming Up Some More Product Details Space Saving Flat Plug With 0.39In ultra slim, flat plug is thinner than traditional plugs, is the perfect solution for tight spaces like behind furniture, cabinets. Reliable Safety Protection FCC & RoHS approved, built-in Phosphor copper wire, the circuit has corrosion-proof, over-heat, over-current, over-charge, short circuits protection. NonSlip Mat Design for Desktop With four anti-slip mats on the bottom keep from slipping and sliding, it can be stable on the table such as nightstand, sofa table and coffee table. Perfect Gift Ideas If your friends or families have lots of devices, then this rapid charger is a lifesaver! A good choice for Travel, Business, Birthday Gifts,and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: I love this for traveling. It fits compactly in my suitcase. It has multiple plug ins and device outlets which was plenty for the two of us. the cord length is good. I kept it on the nightstand. And it's durable. It dropped several times and is still working well with no pieces falling off/apart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible for students
reviews.reviewText: I'm a graduate student and last year I carried a full power strip in my backpack at all times because the classrooms I was in often only had one working outlet that the entire class was trying to use. I'm grateful that I ordered this and now have a much more travel-friendly option that extends the reach of the outlets and gives spots for multiple folks to plug in! It feels pretty durable (it's been kicking around the bottom of my backpack for several months at least) and works great so, I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and works as it should
reviews.reviewText: Recently stayed at old hotel in French quarter New Orleans so limited outlets and no USB ports as you might find in newer chain. Glad I had it. It takes little room in my bag. Cord plenty long enough so it easily sets on the table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars use for travel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I petsit as a side job but work remotely on the weekends so sThis is nice to travel with. I also bring it with me to hotels instead of having one of those 3 in one chargers for my phone watch and wireless ear buds. More cords are involved but that’s easier to fit in luggage. Plus if I am with friends I we have more outlet options for hair tools. So far no issues on performance that I can tell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommend on trips
reviews.reviewText: I do recommend this item when traveling. It was useful for my needs on a cruise I recently was on. I had several items plugged in and charging my phone and earbuds was fantastic and ready when I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cord wraps up neatly around box
reviews.reviewText: Nothing hangs out to snag on stuff

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great value. This powerstrip is very convenient when traveling or for hard to reach outlets. I would definitely buy again
